trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Add Extension</languageKeyword> asynchronous operation adds an available extension to your cloud service.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Add Extension</languageKeyword> asynchronous operation adds an available extension to your cloud service.

trans-unit.source: In Microsoft Azure, a process can run as an extension of a cloud service.
trans-unit.target: In Microsoft Azure, a process can run as an extension of a cloud service.

trans-unit.source: You can find the available extension by using the <link xlink:href="7642ece7-4277-4f20-80d6-c88e2dc5f03d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Available Extensions</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: You can find the available extension by using the <link xlink:href="7642ece7-4277-4f20-80d6-c88e2dc5f03d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Available Extensions</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Add Extension</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Add Extension</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2013-03-01</userInput> or a later version.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2013-03-01</userInput> or a later version.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the format of the request body:
trans-unit.target: The following example shows the format of the request body:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the provider namespace of the extension.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the provider namespace of the extension.

trans-unit.source: The provider namespace for Azure extensions is <codeInline>Microsoft.Windows.Azure.Extensions</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The provider namespace for Azure extensions is <codeInline>Microsoft.Windows.Azure.Extensions</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of the extension.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the type of the extension.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identifier of the extension.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the identifier of the extension.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the thumbprint of the certificate that is used to encrypt the configuration specified in <languageKeyword>PrivateConfiguration</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the thumbprint of the certificate that is used to encrypt the configuration specified in <languageKeyword>PrivateConfiguration</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: If this element is not specified, a certificate may be automatically generated and added to the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: If this element is not specified, a certificate may be automatically generated and added to the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the thumbprint algorithm of the certificate that is used to encrypt the configuration specified in <languageKeyword>PrivateConfiguration</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the thumbprint algorithm of the certificate that is used to encrypt the configuration specified in <languageKeyword>PrivateConfiguration</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the public configuration that is defined using the schema returned by the <link xlink:href="7642ece7-4277-4f20-80d6-c88e2dc5f03d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Available Extensions</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the public configuration that is defined using the schema returned by the <link xlink:href="7642ece7-4277-4f20-80d6-c88e2dc5f03d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Available Extensions</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the private configuration that is defined using the schema returned by the <link xlink:href="7642ece7-4277-4f20-80d6-c88e2dc5f03d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Available Extensions</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the private configuration that is defined using the schema returned by the <link xlink:href="7642ece7-4277-4f20-80d6-c88e2dc5f03d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Available Extensions</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the extension.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the extension.

trans-unit.source: If this element is not specified or an asterisk (<parameterReference>*</parameterReference>) is used as the value, the latest version of the extension is used.
trans-unit.target: If this element is not specified or an asterisk (<parameterReference>*</parameterReference>) is used as the value, the latest version of the extension is used.

trans-unit.source: If the value is specified with a major version number and an asterisk as the minor version number (<parameterReference>X.*</parameterReference>), the latest minor version of the specified major version is selected.
trans-unit.target: If the value is specified with a major version number and an asterisk as the minor version number (<parameterReference>X.*</parameterReference>), the latest minor version of the specified major version is selected.

trans-unit.source: If a major version number and a minor version number are specified (<parameterReference>X.Y</parameterReference>), the specific extension version is selected.
trans-unit.target: If a major version number and a minor version number are specified (<parameterReference>X.Y</parameterReference>), the specific extension version is selected.

trans-unit.source: If a version is specified, an auto-upgrade is performed on the role instance.
trans-unit.target: If a version is specified, an auto-upgrade is performed on the role instance.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the Management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the Management service.

trans-unit.source: For an asynchronous operation, you can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> with the value of the header to determine whether the operation is complete, has failed, or is still in progress.
trans-unit.target: For an asynchronous operation, you can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> with the value of the header to determine whether the operation is complete, has failed, or is still in progress.
